amendment.description: An amendment in the nature of a substitute No. 11 printed in Part B of House Report 114-388 to establish an independent advisory committee to review certain regulations, and for other purposes.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Murphy (FL) amendment was withdrawn.
Amendment (A011) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Murphy (FL).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A011) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Murphy (FL).
